name: Card Rogue
description:
Rogue card is a deckbuilding  roguelike game, inspired by slay the spire and the dungeons of dredmor character creation system

You pick three classes at the start of each run, each class will give you three cards

At the end of each combat round, you will be able to pick a new card from one of your classes

Controls:

To use an attack card, drag it to the enemie you want to attack

To use a power or a skill card, drag it up, outsite your hand area

Keywords: 

Stealth:  if you use a card with this keyword, if you haven't used any attack this turn and don't take any damage, next turn your attacks do double damage

Vulnerable: enemies with vulnerable take 50% more damage

Weak: enemies with weak deal 25% less damage

Slayer: deals double damage to a monster type

Last Resource: effect triggers only if you have less than half your initial life

Fatigue: you gain 1 less attack point next turn
